summary: E-commerce or product management app with admin authentication and product management features. Currently working on adding SKU field to the add product page and fixing admin permission denied error.
architectural_notes: Uses Internet Identity for authentication with admin role checking
Backend has admin registration/permission logic that needs first-user auto-admin setup
known_issues: Admin permission denied error: current Internet Identity principal not registered as admin

existing_features.title: Add a visible, functional SKU input field to the Add Product form in AdminProductsPage. The SKU field should appear in the ProductForm component, be required, accept alphanumeric input, and its value must be submitted along with the other product fields when the form is saved.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add SKU field to the add product page
Fix admin permission denied error - first logged-in user becomes admin
